participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is a caring and dedicated coach who loves spending time with his sons. He enjoys the simple pleasures of life, such as savoring a glass of wine in the evenings after a busy day.
participant_1.background: i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i coach little league baseball. i have five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is an imaginative and playful child who loves singing and learning new things. Her passion for chocolate candy reflects her cheerful nature.
participant_2.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.
